name: Independent Thought
briefDescription: As an introduction, Independent Thought (iThought â€“ www.ithought.in) is a National Human Rights organization working towards equity, justice and mutual respect. We work on human right and law through direct Intervention, Advocacy and Judicial actions and provide technical and hand-holding support to non government, government and multilateral Funding, Policy, Research and Grassroots organizations in several states of India.
